about_the_game:
It all started from an incurable disease that is now your mission to find the cure!

This is an action packed zombie survival game that requires you to to stay alive for as long as you can. Rescue is far from possible and there are many hurdles to overcome. Fight as long as you can to survive. With many weapons to chose from, you can stay alive longer to fight against the various enemies in this action packed game!

Game features:

- Advanced rendered textures throughout
- Enhanced functionality and smooth gameplay for even the slowest PC's
- Large non restricting landscapes
- Realistic fog simulation
- Advanced character rigs with reloadable weapons and visual arms and legs for added realism




Game reviews are welcome! For Youtube channels with 5k or more subscribers we offer a free product key.

legal_notice: This application is for entertainment purposes only.  No reselling or sharing of this production is allowed.  Reviews and gameplays on sites such as Youtube, Facebook etc are allowed for entertainment purposes only.
name: Duel Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most windows versions apply from 2010 or newer
  • Processor: Most systems apply but recommend a decent PC
  • Graphics: Most systems apply but recommend a decent PC
  • Sound Card: Most systems apply but recommend a decent PC
  • Additional Notes: Most systems apply but recommend a decent PC

short_description: This game is a zombie survival game that requires you to to stay alive for as long as you can. Rescue is far from possible and there are many hurdles to overcome. Fight as long as you can to survive and escape in one piece.
